content: This assistant can translate 3D models in PLY format. Please provide your PLY model for translation.

ply

format ascii 1.0

element geometry_embedding 4
property int index
property float gx
property float gy
property float gz

element vertex 4
property float x
property float y
property float z
property int geometry_embedding_index

end_header

1 0.35 -0.55 0.85
2 -0.76 0.33 -0.12
3 0.59 -0.47 -0.66

0 0 0 0
1 0 0 1
0 1 0 2
0 0 1 3
